title: Is there any app which lets you play music on your laptop from your phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: In fact there is. There is an app called Airdroid. With this app you can play or access your phone wirelessly to play music. Along with playing music you can do much more. Manage your phone on web with Airdroid But for this Airdroid app should be downloaded in mobile phone. For PC you can access by either using web browser or Airdroid desktop app.
